strings.Value: "The deserted temple was peaceful. Serene. The followers of Groetus do not build their own shrines, but gather to worship on the ruins of the other gods."
"What an amazing tradition! But I imagine that makes Groetus unpopular among the followers of other gods..."
"The rat god waits until other gods leave their old houses. Then he moves in and rules them himself. Ha!"
"'The look of the deserted temple pleased me, because I feel like dying of boredom in it!' â€” Well, I'm not surprised at all by that, ha, ha, ha!"
